title: Glasvegas condensed gothic
content:
I've been admiring this condensed gothic on a large poster at my local station. It isn't quite as impressive at this smaller scale. The G without a spur on the bottom right and the S are fairly distinctive.

[Village Green - Glasvegas](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419101728/http:/www.villagegreenstudio.com/#glasvegas)
author: Justin_Ch
